if(NOT TARGET Eigen)
    file(GLOB_RECURSE EIGEN_MODULES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Eigen)
    add_library(Eigen INTERFACE)
    target_include_directories(Eigen INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Eigen)
    target_link_libraries(${VISERA_CORE} PUBLIC Eigen)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET NlohmannJSON)
    file(GLOB_RECURSE NOLOHMANN_MODULES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/NlohmannJSON)
    add_library(NlohmannJSON INTERFACE)
    target_include_directories(Eigen INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/NlohmannJSON)
    target_link_libraries(${VISERA_CORE} PUBLIC NlohmannJSON)
endif()

if(NOT TARGET spdlog)
    add_subdirectory(${VISERA_CORE_EXTERNAL_PATH}/Spdlog)
    target_link_libraries(${VISERA_CORE} PUBLIC spdlog::spdlog)
endif()
